data.title: Where to find marine data held by the British Oceanographic Data Centre (BODC)
data.meta_description: We process, archive and distribute biological, chemical, physical and geophysical marine data. Search our environmental measurements database, Published Data Library, Numeric model data portal or other hosted data systems.
data.text:
Access all data (including CTD profiles, currents, samples and wave data) held in our database.

Access all Conductivity, Temperature and Depth (CTD) data held in our database.

Access all glider metadata held in our database.

(Please be aware this prototype metadata inventory currently displays additional platform types.)

Access Sea level data from the UK Tide Gauge Network, GLOSS/WOCE/Clivar projects and our holdings of Bottom Pressure Recorder (BPR) data.

Obtain data acquired from Argo floats. Temperature and salinity profiles, metadata or trajectories may be obtained.
